verses.verse: And <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> as <S%H4428>king<s%>, instead of <S%H3659>Coniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%>, whom <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> made <S%H4427>king<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

But neither <S%H5650>he<s%>, nor his servants, nor the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, did <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, which he <S%H1696>spake<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>.

And <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3081>Jehucal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8018>Shelemiah<s%>, and <S%H6846>Zephaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%>, the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, to the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H6419>Pray<s%> now unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our God for <S%H430>us<s%>.
Now <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> came <S%H935>in<s%> and went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>; for they had not <S%H5414>put<s%> him into <S%H1004>prison<s%>.

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H2428>army<s%> was come <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; and when the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> that were <S%H6696>besieging<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H8088>tidings<s%> of <S%H3389>them<s%>, they brake up from Jerusalem.
Then came the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> unto the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Thus shall ye <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, that <S%H7971>sent<s%> you unto me to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H6547>me<s%>: Behold, Pharaoh's <S%H2428>army<s%>, which is come <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H5833>help<s%> <S%H7725>you<s%>, shall return to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> into their own <S%H776>land<s%>.

And the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> shall come <S%H7725>again<s%>, and <S%H3898>fight<s%> against this <S%H5892>city<s%>; and they shall <S%H3920>take<s%> <S%H8313>it<s%>, and burn it with <S%H784>fire<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H5377>Deceive<s%> not <S%H5315>yourselves<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> shall <S%H1980>surely<s%> <S%H3212>depart<s%> from <S%H3212>us<s%>; for they shall not depart.

For though ye had <S%H5221>smitten<s%> the whole <S%H2428>army<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> that <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H7604>you<s%>, and there remained but <S%H1856>wounded<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> among <S%H6965>them<s%>, yet would they rise up every <S%H376>man<s%> in his <S%H168>tent<s%>, and <S%H8313>burn<s%> this <S%H5892>city<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H2428>that<s%>, when the army of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> was broken <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> for <S%H6440>fear<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H2428>army<s%>,

then <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, to receive his portion <S%H8432>there<s%>, in the midst of the <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And when he was in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, a <S%H1167>captain<s%> of the <S%H6488>ward<s%> was <S%H8034>there<s%>, whose name was <S%H3376>Irijah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8018>Shelemiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%>; and he laid <S%H8610>hold<s%> on <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thou art falling <S%H5307>away<s%> to the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, It is <S%H8267>false<s%>; I am not falling <S%H5307>away<s%> to the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>. But he <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> not to <S%H3376>him<s%>; so Irijah laid <S%H8610>hold<s%> on <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, and <S%H8610>brought<s%> him to the <S%H8269>princes<s%>.

And the <S%H8269>princes<s%> were <S%H7107>wroth<s%> with <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H5414>him<s%>, and put him in <S%H612>prison<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe<s%>; for they had <S%H6213>made<s%> that the <S%H3608>prison<s%>.

When <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> was come <S%H935>into<s%> the <S%H1004>dungeon-house<s%>, and into the <S%H2588>cells<s%>, and <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> had <S%H3427>remained<s%> there <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>;

Then <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%>, and <S%H3947>fetched<s%> <S%H4428>him<s%>: and the king <S%H7592>asked<s%> him <S%H5643>secretly<s%> in his <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Is there any <S%H1697>word<s%> from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>? And <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, There <S%H3426>is<s%>. He <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H5414>also<s%>, Thou shalt be delivered into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>.

Moreover <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%>, Wherein have I <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H5650>thee<s%>, or against thy servants, or against this <S%H5971>people<s%>, that ye have <S%H5414>put<s%> me in <S%H1004>prison<s%>?

Where <S%H346>now<s%> are your <S%H5030>prophets<s%> that <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> unto <S%H559>you<s%>, saying, The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> shall not <S%H935>come<s%> against <S%H776>you<s%>, nor against this land?

And now <S%H8085>hear<s%>, I pray <S%H113>thee<s%>, O my lord the <S%H4428>king<s%>: let my <S%H8467>supplication<s%>, I pray <S%H5307>thee<s%>, be presented <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7725>thee<s%>, that thou cause me not to return to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe<s%>, lest I die <S%H4191>there<s%>.

Then <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%>, and they <S%H6485>committed<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> into the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>guard<s%>; and they <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H3117>daily<s%> a <S%H3603>loaf<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> out of the <S%H644>bakers<s%>' <S%H2351>street<s%>, until all the <S%H3899>bread<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H8552>spent<s%>. Thus <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H3427>remained<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>guard<s%>.
